text:
Hello, I am new to this slack thread and to HubSpot so my apologies if I ask silly questions.

I am trying to write an integration to HubSpot in which I retrieve all the contacts associated with one company.  I am using this endpoint: "<https://api.hubapi.com/companies/{id}/contacts>" which is returning several contacts correctly.  However the contacts returned are all IsPrimary on this company.  Is there a way to get all contacts associated with the company, whether or not they are primary?

Many thanks.

Does anybody know what happens if I "enable GDPR tools" in settings. More specifically, do consent banners automatically start showing up right away or do I get a chance to manage banners and set them to active/inactive?
Consent banner are managed under Settings -> Privacy & Consent
<@U03MU3H35R6> right, but it's unclear what actually happens when "enabled" is toggled
if all of the banners start showing up instantly
or if I get a chance to adjust settings and enable each variant
Banners wont show until activated under Privacy & Consent to my knowledge
<@U03MU3H35R6> I think I was mistaken in thinking that "enable GDPR tools" was required for turning on cookie consent banners
as far as I can tell, cookie consent banners can be turned on without fully enabled GDPR
which makes sense, Cookie Banners have been around before GDPR

Hello

I'm not able to connect public app via link in Auth, when I follow that link, it redirects me to choosing account page then when I chose acc it redirects me to page where I have to confirm that I want this app to be connected to my acc, but it don't give me a time to confirm and immediately redirects to redirect url of my app.
What I have to do in this case?
